headline: Datadog (DDOG) Gets $120 Price Target from Stifel — Analyst Reiterates Hold
summary: Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) is one of the 12 AI Stocks Every Investor is Watching. On June 16, Stifel analyst Brad Reback reiterated a “Hold” rating on the stock with a $120.00 price target. Holding mixed views regarding the company’s growth trajectory and investment strategy, the firm noted how Datadog did not provide an intra-quarter consumption update in […]
